97373.name: Total population (Gapminder, UN Population Division)
97373.description: Gapminder's total population estimates are used until 1949; the UN Population Division's estimates are used from 1950-2015; and the UN's population projections are used to extend the series to 2016.
97373.datasetName: Total population - Gapminder, UN Population Division
97373.s_name: Gapminder until 1949, UN Population Division from 1950-2015, UN projection for 2016

source.name: Gapminder until 1949, UN Population Division from 1950-2015, UN projection for 2016
source.dataPublisherSource: Gapminder, United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, Population Division (2017). World Population Prospects: The 2017 Revision, DVD Edition; historical data
source.link: Gapminder: https://www.gapminder.org/data/documentation/gd003/ UN Population Division and the UN population projections: https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/Download/Standard/Population/
source.additionalInfo: Gapminder's total population estimates are used until 1949; the UN Population Division's estimates are used from 1950-2015; and the UN's population projections are used to extend the series to 2016.
